Summary: Huge light appeared & followed me in car getting closer. All of a sudden it became small light and totally disappeared. Got out of car & saw & heard nothing.
divs: sighting detailsi got out of car to lock gate. it was quiet with no cars coming in either direction. when i got back in car i noticed two huge lights in my rear view mirror just over the road on other side of locked gate. i thought it was odd cause there hadn't been anything there just seconds earlier and also these lights were much larger than any car lights. i started down the path to my house and these lights (which turned into one gigantic light) started following me. the light was traveling about 15-20' up in the air and over in the field next to road. i was constantly watching my rearview mirror and noticed the light gaining on me. at this time i noticed several small lights on the left side of it. i was thinking, "what the heck is that????" i was getting very scared at that moment and just wanted to get home. about 3\4 mile after i first saw it i noticed that the monstrous light went to just a small light with 1 smaller light next to it and 2 seconds later it vanished. i immediately jumped out of my car and looked around and there was nothing in the sky and there was total silence. i was up on a high hill and can see for miles in all directions. just as quickly as it had appeared it disappeared. i never heard any sound coming from it either. i have no idea what it was because i could never see anything other than this gigantic light which looked to be the size of a car.
